clinical_study.brief_title: Anti-calculus Efficacy of a Dentrifice Containing Sodium Pyrophosphate and Potassium Pyrophosphate in Heavy Calculus Formers
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Anti-calculus Efficacy of a Dentrifice Containing Sodium Pyrophosphate and Potassium Pyrophosphate in Heavy Calculus Formers

lead_sponsor.agency: Government Dental College and Research Institute, Bangalore

clinical_study.source: Government Dental College and Research Institute, Bangalore

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to determine the anti-calculus effect of dentrifice containing 5% sodium pyrophosphate and potassium pyrophosphate in a triple-mask placebo controlled randomized clinical trial.

clinical_study.condition: ANTICALCULUS EFFICACY OF PYROPHOSPHATE IN HEAVY CALCULUS FORMERS

arm_group.description: DENTRIFICE CONTAINING 5% SODIUM AND POTASSIUM PYROPHOSPHATE WAS PRESCRIBED AND SUBJECTS WERE EVALUATED AT 3MONTH AND 6 MONTHS
PLACEBO DENTRIFICE WITHOUT PYROPHOSPATE WAS PRESCRIBED AND SUBJECTS WERE EVALUATED AT 3MONTH AND 6 MONTHS

intervention.intervention_name: DENTRIFICE CONTAINING 5% SODIUM AND POTASSIUM PYROPHOSPHATE
intervention.description: DENTRIFICE CONTAINING 5% SODIUM AND POTASSIUM PYROPHOSPHATE WAS ADVISED TWICE DAILY FOR 6 MONTHS
PLACEBO DENTRIFICE WITHOUT PYROPHOSPHATE WAS ADVISED TWICE DAILY FOR 6 MONTHS

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Age group 15-30 years.
2. Subjects who have not received periodontal therapy within preceding 1year.
3. Heavy calculus formers with simplified calculus index score 1.5-3 .
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Age group 15-30 years.
2. Subjects who have not received periodontal therapy within preceding 1year.
3. Heavy calculus formers with simplified calculus index score 1.5-3 .
